Text.Page:
Are you always running out of space for the items you acquire on your travels? Sick of interrupting your adventures to organize your inventory?

If so, I have good news for you! Getty from Freedom Plaza in Velika, the city of commerce, has the solution you've been searching for, and your first inventory expansion is free!

That's right! Free! Try it yourself and discover the convenience of having an expanded inventory.

Come to Freedom Plaza today!

Hey there! Do you find yourself shoving items into your backpack long after it's full, only to realize they're strewn about the path behind you?

I offer an "Inventory Expansion" service for people just like you. First time's on the house!

If you're satisfied, you're welcome to come back and purchase my larger expansions!
